title: WTB T206 Jake Beckley and/ or Joe Kelley
author: almostdone

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Jake Beckley and/ or Joe Kelley
posts.post_content:
T206 Jake Beckley and/ or Joe Kelley

I am needed these two cards to complete a small set.  Because of a lack or funds I am willing to settle for lower condition cards.  I'm not picky at all on the condition and even beaters would suffice for this need.

If you have one or both of these cards in lower condition and are willing to part with them for a fair price please let me know either through response to this thread or PM me.

Thanks,
Drew

UPDATE:  I found a Kelley but am still in need of the Beckley.

Let me know if you might have one that fits above description.

Drew

Drew,

I have an absolute beater of a beckley that I would be willing to part with.  I can get you a scan tonight if you're interested.  

Thanks,

Jason
